name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Support Engineer with a robust background in Technical Support for SaaS applications, leveraging 13+ years of experience in the healthcare and financial industries. Adept at enhancing Customer Experience through effective Problem Solving and Communication skills. Proficient in SQL and experienced in utilizing tools such as **Metabase**, **Zendesk**, **Linear**, **JIRA**, and **Sendgrid** to streamline support processes and enhance customer satisfaction. 

Possesses a strong foundation in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, complemented by hands-on expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** for delivering high-performance applications. Skilled in building AI/ML-powered platforms that enable predictive analytics and real-time processing, with the ability to deploy cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Familiar with compliance-driven development aligning with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, alongside a strong background in MLOps using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
